languages.text: "Нам нужно время, чтобы перевязать раны и перегруппироваться. Мы прикроем ваш отход, чтобы никто не ударил в спину. Доберитесь до шаттла перв{mf|ым|ой} — мы сразу за вами".
"We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."
languages.original_text: "Нам нужно время, чтобы перевязать раны и перегруппироваться. Мы прикроем ваш отход, чтобы никто не ударил в спину. Доберитесь до шаттла перв{mf|ым|ой} — мы сразу за вами".

traits.locale_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first, we'll be right behind you."
"We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first, we'll be right behind you."
"We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."
"We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."
"We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."
"We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

languages.text: "Wir brauchen etwas Zeit, um unsere Wunden zu versorgen und uns zu sammeln. Wir sichern Euren Rückzug und sorgen dafür, dass Euch niemand in den Rücken fällt. Geht Ihr zuerst zum Shuttle. Wir bleiben dicht hinter Euch."
languages.original_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

traits.locale_text: "Wir brauchen etwas Zeit, um unsere Wunden zu versorgen und uns zu sammeln. Wir sichern Euren Rückzug und sorgen dafür, dass Euch niemand in den Rücken fällt. Geht Ihr zuerst zum Shuttle. Wir bleiben dicht hinter Euch."

languages.text: « Nous avons besoin de temps pour panser nos plaies et nous regrouper. Nous couvrirons votre retraite et veillerons à ce que personne ne vous prenne à revers. Gagnez au plus vite la navette, nous serons juste derrière vous. »
languages.original_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons besoin de temps pour panser nos plaies et nous regrouper. Nous couvrirons votre retraite et veillerons à ce que personne ne vous prenne à revers. Gagnez au plus vite la navette, nous serons juste derrière vous. »

languages.text: «Necesitamos tiempo para vendarnos las heridas y recomponernos. Cubriremos su retirada y nos aseguraremos de que no le ataquen por la retaguardia. Vaya primero a la lanzadera; nosotros estaremos justo detrás».
languages.original_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

traits.locale_text: «Necesitamos tiempo para vendarnos las heridas y recomponernos. Cubriremos su retirada y nos aseguraremos de que no le ataquen por la retaguardia. Vaya primero a la lanzadera; nosotros estaremos justo detrás».

languages.text: “我们需要时间包扎伤口，重整旗鼓。在你撤退的过程中，我们会提供掩护，确保敌人不会从后方冲过来。快去穿梭机那边吧，我们就在你身后。”
languages.original_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

traits.locale_text: “我们需要时间包扎伤口，重整旗鼓。在你撤退的过程中，我们会提供掩护，确保敌人不会从后方冲过来。快去穿梭机那边吧，我们就在你身后。”

languages.text: 「私たちには傷を手当てして、態勢を立て直す時間が必要です。あなたたちの撤退を援護し、背後を確実に守ります。先にシャトルに乗ってください。すぐに追いつきます」
languages.original_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちには傷を手当てして、態勢を立て直す時間が必要です。あなたたちの撤退を援護し、背後を確実に守ります。先にシャトルに乗ってください。すぐに追いつきます」

languages.text: "Yaralarımızı tedavi edip tekrar toplanmak için zamana ihtiyacımız var. Siz geri çekilirken arkanızı kollayacağız ki sinsi bir saldırıyla karşı karşıya kalmayalım. Siz mekiğe geçin, biz tam arkanızda olacağız."
languages.original_text: "We need time to dress our wounds and regroup. We will cover your retreat and make sure there is no attack from the rear. Get to the shuttle first; we'll be right behind you."

traits.locale_text: "Yaralarımızı tedavi edip tekrar toplanmak için zamana ihtiyacımız var. Siz geri çekilirken arkanızı kollayacağız ki sinsi bir saldırıyla karşı karşıya kalmayalım. Siz mekiğe geçin, biz tam arkanızda olacağız."
